name: THIS MAZE HATES YOU.
description:
Everyone loves a maze game.

But this maze hates you.

  • Navigate an infinite perfect maze.
  • Reach your destination.
  • Standard FPS controls.

Game by me.

Made for A Game By its Cover 2022.

Inspired by the cartridge This Maze is Not Fair by Adam Tierney.

Some games are best left unplayed.
